metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41974 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: multipath-tools 0.7.0 through 0.9.x before 0.9.2 allows local users toobtain root access, as exploited alone or in conjunction withCVE-2022-41973. Local users able to write to UNIX domain sockets can bypassaccess controls and manipulate the multipath setup. This can lead to localprivilege escalation to root. This occurs because an attacker can repeat akeyword, which is mishandled because arithmetic ADD is used instead ofbitwise OR.

criterions.comment: multipath-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
